title: Azure Active Directory: Auto-rollout of Conditional Access policies
description:
Starting in November 2023, Microsoft will begin automatically protecting customers with Microsoft managed Conditional Access policies. These are policies that Microsoft creates and enables in customer tenants.  The following policies will be rolled out to all eligible tenants:
1.	MFA for admin portals: This policy covers privileged admin roles and requires MFA when an admin signs into a Microsoft admin portal.
2.	MFA for per-user MFA users: This policy covers users with per-user MFA and requires MFA for all cloud apps.??3.	MFA for high-risk sign-ins: This policy covers all users and requires MFA and reauthentication for high-risk sign-ins.
